function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic complicating efforts to realize a 'Just Transition'.","Impact":"Loss of more than 500,000 clean energy jobs and halted momentum in the push for solar energy and wind energy.","Mitigation":"Integration of Just Transition principles into community and economic recovery efforts.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers in the clean energy sector, communities affected by transition.","Owner":"Policy makers, government agencies, community organizations."},{"Description":"Vulnerability of global society to disconnection bans and energy bill deferral.","Impact":"Potential for increased vulnerability due to lack of energy access and financial strain.","Mitigation":"Direct energy assistance programs, support measures for commercial and small industrial activities.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Low-income households, workers, small businesses.","Owner":"Government agencies, energy suppliers, community organizations."}]}
